Title: Episode #1.5
Writer: Steven Knight (created by), Tom Hardy (created by), Chips Hardy (created by), Steven Knight, Ben Hervey
Actors: Tom Hardy, Jessie Buckley, Jefferson Hall, Oliver Powell
Plot: A duel at dawn takes a surprising turn, Zilpha is met with darkness, the East India Company is under investigation, and Delaney faces a race against time to keep his plot a secret.
